item.title: HN Tray icon in 50 lines of Clojure
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description:
Today I got a little bit bored and spend few hours poking around with java.awt in Clojure. Result is tray app that shows stories from HN front page. Just in ~50 lines of Clojure code. Enjoy!

Github Project.

Source code is below:

item.title: Clojure on Raspberry Pi: OpenJDK vs Oracle JRE (Java 8 armhf beta) benchmark
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Here you can download latest Java 8 preview for armhf. Lets benchmark it on Raspberry Pi! Pi is running Raspbian.

item.title: Clojure on BeagleBone: OpenJDK vs Oracle Embedded JRE benchmark
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: After installing Embedded JRE on BeagleBone I decided to benchmark it against OpenJDK.

item.title: Installing Oracle Embedded Java on Beaglebone and Ubuntu Issue
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description:
Recently I was playing with Clojure on Beaglebone and decided to give a try to Oracle’s new Embedded JRE. But after downloading JRE from Oracle website (with filling useless stupid forms) I received following error:

java: no such file or directory

So here is fix:

sudo apt-get install -y libc6-armel libsfgcc1

via
